prompt-str: You set out to explore the ruins of Ithar. Some more text to force multiple lines. Even more and more and more... And some more even, maybe we can even get to three lines if we're lucky.
You go through the gate. Let's try to force this to be in multiple lines as well. I'll write another sentence just to make sure that it goes to multiple lines. Should be enough now.
You want to turn back but something compels you to go in.
You smash down the closed gate.
You return to the gate but find it closed. You seem to have no choice but to keep pushing forward.
